input_tokens.description: The number of input tokens that were used to generate the response.

output_tokens.description: The number of output tokens that were generated by the model.

total_tokens.description: The total number of tokens that were used.

input_tokens_details.description: A breakdown of input token usage that was recorded.

output_tokens_details.description: A breakdown of output token usage that was recorded.

title: Usage
description: Token usage statistics that were recorded for the response.
